Afternoon.Title: Vegetables
Afternoon.Description: Chop peppers, onions and mushrooms as needed. Label with date.

Afternoon.Title: Coffee Machine
Afternoon.Description: Wash the coffee machine and capsule dispenser.

Evening.Title: Mop
Evening.Description: Mop the floor. Add one pump from the wall-mounted detergent dispenser to a bucket 1/3rd full of water.

AnyShift.Title: Mop
AnyShift.Description: Probe 2 toasties (or reach closing time having made at most 1 toastie).

AnyShift.Title: Dishes
AnyShift.Description: Remove all clean dishes from the drying rack, ensure the cutlery box is closed. Wash dishes from shift with soap and hot water, leave to dry on rack
